title: Edukku murugA
sahitya:
Edukku murugA ennai shOdikkirAi innum nIti Edum ariyAda nAthanallavO nI


anupallavi

  Adi mudal iduvarai ayyanE unnaiyanrO nAdi enakku enru nambi irukkinrEn


caraNam    alla anEkam paTTu aDiyEn keTTadellAm sholli muraiyiTTum shOdanai kuraiyavillai
pollAda vinaigaL ellAm pOkka unnai pOTriya pOdum karaiyETri enaik-kAkkAdu
